t: Why does Amazon use an arrow for a trademark? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 10): The curved arrow in the Amazon logo does a couple of things! * It shows that amazon sell everything ‘from a to z’ with the placement of the arrow. If you look at it, you can see it starts at the ‘a’ in AmaZon, and ends at the ‘z’ * The arrow also communicates the ...

t: Is the curved arrow on the Amazon logo supposed to be a smile? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): On initial sight, yes it is supposed to be a smile. But the actual meaning is,a-z everything is available. As we can see the tail of the arrow starts from a and the head of the arrow points to z.
